name: Sweet Potatoes & Broccoli
description: Make this flavourful side dish in minutes. No added oil or fat!
preparation: Toss vegetables with seasoning and place in a Rectangular Steamer.
Cover and microwave on high for 6 minutes.
Toss with citrus juice and serve.
tips: Slice potatoes fast with a 4-in-1 Mandoline.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving and 1 cup steamed veggies.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
